H0.text: Which is the smallest country in area in mainland Africa. Lesotho

H1.text: Which is the smallest country in area in mainland Africa. Swaziland

H2.text: Which is the smallest country in area in mainland Africa. Burundi

H3.text: Which is the smallest country in area in mainland Africa. Gambia

A4.text: Geographically, the Gambia is the smallest country in continental Africa

A5.text: The Gambia is the smallest country on the African mainland.
